src:
Pijana Slovenka na Hrvaškem povzročila hudo nesrečo, poškodovan potnik (32)
Zaletela se je v parkiran tovornjak.
05 Nov 2019, 10:44 by T. V.
ČEMERNICA – Pijana voznica (58) tovornjaka s slovenskimi registrskimi oznakami je v ponedeljek na Hrvaškem povzročila prometno nesrečo. V krvi je imela kar 1,78 promila alkohola.Nesreča se je zgodila okoli 18.40 v naselju Čemernica blizu Virovitice, ko je voznica zaradi prevelike hitrosti trčila v drug tovornjak, ki je bil nepravilno parkiran. Po trku je njeno vozilo odbilo v kovinski drog in nato še v osebno vozilo, ustavilo pa se je v jarku. Pri tem je bil huje poškodovan 32-letni potnik v njenem vozilu, je sporočila hrvaška policija. Voznico čaka kazenska prijava.
text:
Drunk Slovenian woman causes serious accident in injured passenger (32)
She crashed into a parked truck.
05 Nov 2019, 10:44 by T.V.
CEMERNICA - A drunken driver (58) of a truck with Slovenian license plates caused a car accident in Croatia on Monday. She had as much as 1.78 parts of alcohol in her blood. The accident happened at about 6.40pm in the Čemernica settlement near Virovitica when the driver of the car collided with another truck, which was improperly parked, due to speeding. After the collision, her vehicle bounced into a metal pole and then into a passenger car, stopping in a ditch. A 32-year-old passenger in her vehicle was seriously injured, Croatian police said. The ticket is pending criminal charges.
